Name: Swan
Line 1: Why am I sweeping?\nEverything seems nicer when it's clean
Line 3:
My favorite creature?
Hmm...
The tomato bunny, probably
They're very shiny and smooth
Line 4: I don't like getting lost...\nIt's scary...
Line 5: I like being near water\nSometimes there's no ocean or lake...\nThat's okay too
Line 6: Being clean and organized calms me.\nI know where everything is!\nAnd I'm less stressed, too!
Line 7:
What am I?
Don't you know?
I'm a cat.
Not like ___ at the shop, though
Line 8:
My favorite drink?
I think just water.
Sometimes things taste different than I expect...
But water is always the same

Name: Gardora
Line 2: I heard plants like music\nI can't play any instruments...\nSo I hum to them instead
Line 4: This plant is named Beepo\nI love them♡
Line 5: I have a room full of plants!\nIt's a little unorganized...
Line 6:
My favorite creature?\Any plant creature!
Hmm... if I really had to choose...
Maybe the flower bunny!
They're so cute!
Line 7: My favorite drink?\nTea!\nThere are so many different flavors!
